item.title: Example Page 1
item.description:

item.title: PolMeth Europe 2021
item.description:
The first PolMeth Europe 2021 took place online in March 2021.

Wednesday, 17 March 2021 Thursday, 18 March 2021 Friday, 19 March 2021
12:30-13:00 Welcome Address Vera Troeger 12:30-13:00 Hang-out in Gather-Town 12:30-13:00 Hang-out in Gather-Town
13:00-14:30 Parallel sessions 13:00-14:30Parallel sessions13:00-14:30Parallel sessions
Good AdviceModelling Catgorical DataCausal Inference IText as DataMore Good AdviceQualitative Methods
Mert Moral, Evgeny Sedashov, Andrei ZhirnovTaking Distributions Seriously: Interpreting the Effects of Constitutive Variables in Nonlinear Models with InteractionsMartin ElffMuch About Ado Not Very Much? Clarifying the Confusion about Models for Categorical Dependent VariablesLukas Stoetzer, Xiang Zhou, Marco R. SteenbergenCausal Inference with Latent VariablesElliott Ash, Germain Gauthier, Philine WidmerMining Narratives from Large Text CorporaAnja Neundorf, Aykut ÖztürkCost-Effectiveness and Sample Bias in Recruitment using Facebook paid advertisementsAlrik Thiem, Lusine Mkrtchyan, Zuzana SebechlebskaCombinational Regularity Analysis (CORA): A New Method for Uncovering Complex Causation
Thomas Gschwend, Marcel Neunhoeffer, Oliver RittmannSimulating Quantities of Interest when the Dependent Variable is loggedXiao Lu, Thomas KönigLocal Identification of Unobserved Heterogeneity in Quantitative Analyses of Strategic Sequential ChoicesDavid Carlson, Devin Patrick BrownEstimating a Counter-Factual with Uncertainty Through Gaussian Process ProjectionAnnika Fredén, Moa Johansson, Pasko Kisic Merino, Denitsa SaynovaThe value of implementing complex NLP models in political analysis
An elaborative cross-country approach		Denis CohenWhen (not) to trust the overlap in confidence intervals: A practical guideLion Behrens, Ingo RohlfingBayesian Nested Analysis
Disccusant: Andreas MurrDiscussant: Lukas StoetzerDiscussant:  Dominik Hangartner & Marcel NeunhoefferDiscussant: Theresa GesslerDiscussant: Thomas GschwendDiscussant:  ?
14:30-15:30Poster Session I14:30-15:30Poster Session II14:30-15:30Diversity/gender meeting
15:30-17:00Parallel sessions15:30-17:00Parallel sessions15:30-17:00Parallel sessions
Measurement in Applied FieldsSpatial and Temporal DependenciesDigital DataCausal Inference IIExperiments in Migration ResearchReplication & Sensitive Data
Nikitas Konstantinidis, Bernhard ReinsbergLocal Ownership of IFI Conditionality Programs: Conceptualization, Measurement, and ValidationSebastian JuhlEigenvector-Based Semiparametric Filtering of Spatial Autocorrelation in Regression ModelsDaniel Ebanks, Sanmay Das, Hao Yan, R. Michael Alvarez, Betsy SinclairLegislative Communication and Power: Measuring Leadership from Social Media DataJason Poulos, Andrea Albanese, Andrea Mercatanti, Fan LiRetrospective causal inference via matrix completion, with an evaluation of the effect of European integration on labour market outcomes
Anna Getmansky, Konstantinos Matakos, Tolga SinmazdemirHumanitarian Concerns and Acceptance of Syrian Refugees in Turkey: A Conjoint ExperimentFlorian Kern, Katariina Mustasilta
Beyond Replication: Secondary Qualitative Data Analysis in Political Science
Ali Kagalwala, Thiago M.Q. Moreira, Guy WhittenLet them eat pie: addressing the partial contestation problem in multiparty electoral contestsAllyson Benton, Soren Jordan, Andrew PhilipsPicture Perfect: Visualizing Statistical and Substantive Significance of ARCH and GARCH ModelsTheresa GesslerBut is she married? A digital trace data approach to studying users' gendered interest in politiciansMoritz Marbach, Dominik HangartnerProfiling Compliers and Non-compliers for Instrumental-Variable AnalysisGemma DipoppaMigrants and Winning Votes: Evidence from an Anti-Exploitation Campaign in the Italian FieldsSuso Baleato, James Honaker, Mercè CrosasReproducible Privacy: Using Differential Privacy to Share
Sensitive Research Data
Discussant: Marco SteenbergenDiscussant: Vera TroegerDiscussant: Simon MunzertDiscussant: Max GopelrudDiscussant: Sabrina MayerDiscussant: Christian Arnold
17:00-17:15Coffee break17:00-17:15Coffee break17:00-17:15Farewell address
17:15-18:15Keynote17:15-18:15Keynote17:15-18:15Social Events in the Gather-Town Pub
Frauke KreuterNeal Beck
